item.title: U.S. oil prices pare losses as crude supplies fall, investors await OPEC+ decision
item.description: U.S. oil futures pared much of their early Wednesday declines, finding support after government data revealed a weekly crude inventory drop of more th...

item.title: Gold Edges Higher After U.S. Job Creation Slowed
item.description: Gold prices rose after U.S. jobs data showed private payrolls growth was less than expected in November. Futures are trading 0.4% higher at $2,679.50 ...

item.title: U.S. Crude Oil Stockpiles Fall More Than Expected
item.description: U.S. crude oil inventories fell more than expected last week and product stocks saw a buildup as refineries ramped up their capacity use.

item.title: Marvell’s stock skyrockets as it’s dubbed the next hot AI chip name
item.description: Wall Street is excited about Marvell’s traction in custom offerings and partnership with Amazon’s AWS.

item.title: Hormel’s stock slumps as sales are still being hurt by weak turkey prices
item.description: Hormel was impacted by lower prices for whole-bird turkeys this year, as well as a production interruption at a Planters facility in Virginia.
